name: ty-react-nextjs-example
description: Simple Next.js example testing @gersak/ty and @gersak/ty-react packages with Tailwind CSS integration

scripts.copy:ty: rm -rf public/ty && mkdir -p public/ty && cp -r ../../packages/core/dist/* public/ty/ && cp ../../packages/core/css/ty.css public/ty/ && echo 'âœ… Ty files copied from packages/core/dist/'
scripts.rebuild:ty: cd ../../packages/core && npm run pack && cd - && npm install ../../packages/core/gersak-ty-0.2.0.tgz && npm run copy:ty
scripts.dev:with-ty: npm run copy:ty && npm run dev
